trailingComments.value:
*
 * generate authorization related fields for schema of the type
 * @public
 * @param {string} typeName - name of the type
 * @param {object} inputSchema - schema of the type
 * @return {array} adjustments - fields to be added to the schema
only if authorization directive is defined for this type

leadingComments.value: for type User: add field 'password' for mode 'create'

trailingComments.value: for all typeNames with authorization: add 'createdBy'

leadingComments.value: for all typeNames with authorization: add 'createdBy'

trailingComments.value: for all typeNames with authorization: add 'updatedBy'

leadingComments.value: for all typeNames with authorization: add 'updatedBy'
